doc: Specifies one SMARTS pattern to identify the bond to stretch.
One or more real numbers (positive or negative) to be applied to the current value of the bond length to produce modified geometries. The default is 1.0.
Requests the generation of a sequence of scaling factors. The syntax is either <initial_value> <final_value> <#steps> or <#steps> <initial_value> <step_length>.

The termination criteria to use. The syntax is <kind> <threshold>. Acceptable kinds are:
 -> 'minInterfragmentDist': the minimum distance between the fragments resulting by removing the stretched bond must be greater than the threshold.

tag: the importing of chemical objects (e.g., molecular geometries)
